Uses of Class
com.sun.identity.policy.PolicyEvent

  • Packages that use PolicyEvent 
    Package Description
    com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces
    Provides interfaces for writing custom Policy plugins for Conditons, Subjects, Referrals ResponseProviders and Resources.

    • Uses of PolicyEvent in com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces

      Methods in com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces with parameters of type PolicyEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PolicyListener.policyChanged(PolicyEvent policyEvent)
      This method is called by the policy framework whenever a policy is added, removed or changed.
